abstract: New York City police arrest two Brooklyn men for flashing laser at WNBC-TV helicopter on its way to borough to cover a story.
lead_paragraph: Chopper 4 from WNBC-TV was on its way to Downtown Brooklyn to cover a story when it was hit by a green light from a laser near the Barclays Center, the police said.

headline.main: 2 Arrested in Laser Strike on Helicopter
headline.print_headline: 2 Arrested in Laser Strike on Helicopter

snippet: Chopper 4 from WNBC-TV was on its way to Downtown Brooklyn to cover a story when it was hit by a green light from a laser near the Barclays Center, the police said.
